Chris Gayle gifts bat to Amitabh Bachchan

West Indies cricketer Chris Gayle has gifted his autographed bat to Amitabh Bachchan and revealed he loves Bollywood megastar’s films and style.

“Proud to gift my Spartan bat to a legend @srbachchan, love his movies and his style, legend. Thanks @spartancricket,” the batsman tweeted.

Bachchan replied he that he was honoured to receive the gift.

“Chris Gayle .. !! I mean CHRIS GAYLE a fan of Hindi movies and presents me a golden bat autographed !!?? I mean this is revelation,” he wrote. — PTI
title: ENT-BACHCHAN
